title: Fragmentation Munition With Limited Explosive Force
abstract: A Fragmentation Munition Has A Fragmentation Canister Containing Preformed Fragments, And An Explosive Cartridge That Fits Into A Central Hole In The Fragmentation Canister. The Explosive Cartridge Includes An Outer Shell, And An Explosive Within The Outer Shell. The Munition May Be Configured To Precisely Deliver Fragments To A Relatively Small Area, Such As An Area That Is A Few Meters In Radius. Toward That End The Explosive May Be Configured Primarily To Rupture The Housing And Secondarily To Spread Fragments Over A Limited Area. The Main Kinetic Energy Of The Fragments Is From The Acceleration They Gain As Part Of The Munition Falls From A Launcher, Such As A Carrier Aircraft. The Dispersed Fragments May Have A Similar Downward Velocity After Controlled Dispersal By The Explosive, Allowing Them Considerable Kinetic Energy (Considerable Penetrating Power), But With A Precisely Controlled Dispersal Area.

title: Method For Determining Threat Status For Combat Aircrafts
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Method For Decision Support Of A First Combat Aircraft (1) In A Combat Situation Comprising The Steps Of: A) Detecting (3) A Second Combat Aircraft (2), Wherein The Second Combat Aircraft (2) Is Different From The First Combat Aircraft (1), B) Analyzing (4) The Second Combat Aircraft (2) To Determine Its Type, Its Sensor Capacity And Its Total Weapons Capacity, And C) Recording (5) The Sensor Capacity And The Total Weapons Capacity Of The Second Combat Aircraft (2) To Determine A First Geographic Zone Adapted For Defining The Detection Limit Of The Second Combat Aircraft (2) And A Second Geographic Zone Adapted For Defining A Shoot-Down Limit Of The Second Combat Aircraft (2), Respectively, Wherein The First And The Second Geographic Zone Are Adapted For Decision Support Of The First Combat Aircraft (1) In The Combat Situation With The Second Combat Aircraft (2). In This Way, A Possibility Is Provided To Assist The Pilot In Decision Support In Complicated Combat Situations While Being Reliable, Fast And Easy To Handle For The Pilot In Order To Make A Quick And Efficient Decision.

title: A Thermally Concealed Laser Combat Robot With Reconnaissance Function
abstract: The Invention Discloses A Thermally Concealed Laser Combat Robot With A Reconnaissance Function, Which Includes A Wheel-Crawler Robot Platform. The Wheel-Crawler Robot Platform Includes A Chassis Cabin And Crawler Walking Mechanisms Arranged On The Left And Right Sides Of The Chassis Cabin. A Turret Mounting Seat Is Installed On The Top Plate Of The Chassis Cabin Body, And The Turret Mounting Seat Is Connected To The Bracket Through A Rotary Joint That Can Rotate Infinitely 360 Degrees In The Horizontal Direction. The Bracket Is Equipped With A Laser Cannon, A Multi-Tube Cannon And A Laser Generator. The Laser Cannon Is Connected With A Laser Generator, And The Laser Generator Is Connected With A Control Cabinet Arranged On The Chassis Cabin; The Front End Of The Chassis Cabin Is Provided With A Laser Radar. The Invention Has Good Ability To Climb And Overcome Obstacles, Has The Ability To Survive In High Temperature, Explosion And Strong Corrosion Environments, Has Excellent Infrared Stealth And Detection Functions, And Uses Laser Cannons To Instantly And Silently Strike Enemy Equipment And Personnel As Well As The Function Of Short-Term Blindness, It Also Has Better Self-Defense.

title: Suicide Bomber Blast Threat Mitigation System
abstract: A Non-Lethal, Sabot-Deployed Blast Shield Mitigates A Suicide Bomber By Wrapping Around The Bomber And Positioning A Plurality Of Protective Layers Over An Explosive Device To Absorb Emitted Heat, Shock Waves, And Projectiles If The Device Is Detonated. Stand-Offs Such As Inflatable Beams Or Pillows Provide Break-Away Zones Between The Protective Layers, Allowing Some Layers To Expand To A Point Of Failure And Absorb The Maximum Possible Energy. Inner Layers Absorb Shock Waves And Heat. One Or More Outer Layers Resist Projectile Penetration. Protective Layers Can Be Positioned On Opposing Sides Of A Suspect In Case Two Explosive Devices Are Present. Shields Can Deploy With Sufficient Energy To Knock Down A Bomber. In Embodiments, A Plurality Of Shields Can Be Applied Without Interference Therebetween. In Some Embodiments, A Round Shield Includes Bolas Which Spread The Shield In Flight In A Cast-Net Dynamic And Wrap Around The Suspect For Shield Attachment.

title: Method For Duel Handling In A Combat Aircraft
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Method For Decision Support Of A First Combat Aircraft In A Duel Situation With A Second Combat Aircraft. The Method Comprises The Steps Of: A) Determining (3) A First Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Of The First Combat Aircraft (1) And Determining (3) A Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Of The Second Combat Aircraft (2), Wherein The Second Combat Aircraft (2) Is Different To The First Combat Aircraft (1), B) Analyzing (4) The First And The Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Determined In The Previous Step (Step A)) By Fitting The First And The Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters To A Predefined Model, And C) Combining (5) The First Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Analyzed In The Previous Step (Step B)) To Calculate A First Value And Combining (5) The Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Analyzed In The Previous Step (Step B)) To Calculate A Second Value, Wherein The First Value And The Second Value Are Compared To Each Other To Determine The Optimum Success Probability Data Of The First Combat Aircraft (1) And Of The Second Combat Aircraft (2) Adapted For Decision Support In The Duel Situation. In This Way, A Reliable And Fast Tool For The Pilot Is Provided While The Tool Is Easy To Handle And Assists The Pilot In Order To Make A Quick And Efficient Decision In Duel Situations.

title: Method For Stacking A Vehicle On Top Of Another Similar Vehicle And Stackable Vehicle For Performing The Method
abstract: The Present Invention Relates To A Method For Stacking A First Motor Vehicle On Top Of A Second Motor Vehicle, The Method Comprising The Steps Of: Providing A Group Of Rear Tilting Members At The Rear Part Of The Lower Vehicle, Which Will The Rear Part Of The Roof Of The Cabin Of The Lower Vehicle Is Connected To The Ground; A Group Of Front Tilting Members Or Supports Are Provided In The Front Part Of The Roof Of The Cabin Of The Lower Vehicle, The Group Of Front Tilting Members Or The Support Allows The Front Wheels Of The Upper Vehicle To Roll On It; The Upper Vehicle Rolls On The Rear Tilting Member Of The Lower Vehicle, So That The Upper Vehicle Rises Or Climbs From A Position On The Ground To The Top Of The Roof Of The Lower Vehicle Continue To Roll The Upper Vehicle On The Roof Of The Lower Vehicle Until It Reaches The Final Stacking Position Indicated By The Stop Device. In The Final Stacking Position, The Front Wheel Of The Upper Vehicle Rests On The Front Of The Lower Vehicle. The Rear Wheel Of The Upper Vehicle Rests On The Rear Inclined Member Of The Lower Vehicle, Wherein The Upper Vehicle And The Lower Vehicle Are Substantially Vertically Aligned, And The Front Wheels And Rear Wheels Of The Upper Vehicle In The Final Resting Position The Height Of Is Lower Than The Height Of The Roof Of The Lower Vehicle; The Upper Vehicle Is Fixed To The Lower Vehicle By A Suitable Fastening Device, Wherein The Fastening Force Of The Fastening Device Is Preferably Such That The Suspension Of The Upper Vehicle Is Compressed By About 3 To 5 Cm, So Reduce The Overall Height Of The Vehicle Stack; And Remove, Fold Or Shrink Part Or All Of The Rear Tilting Member Of The Lower Vehicle. In Addition, The Present Invention Relates To A Vehicle That Can Perform The Stacking Method. The Vehicle Includes A Vehicle Body, The Vehicle Body Includes Four Wheels And A Cabin With A Roof; A Pair Of Front Tilting Members Or Supports, Which Are Located On The Roof Of The Cabin At The Two Sides Of The Front End; And A Pair Of Rear Tilting Pieces, Which Are Located At The Two Sides Of The Rear End Of The Roof Of The Cabin. Stackable Vehicles Also Include Means For Rapid Aerial Deployment (Airdrop) Of Vehicles Transported In A Stack In A Transport Plane.

title: Method For Recognizing Connection State Of Two-Way Initiating Device Plug
abstract: A Method For Identifying The Connection State Of A Two-Way Pyrotechnic Device Plug, Which Includes A Bomb-Loaded Computer Plug, An Pyrotechnic Device Plug, And A Test Equipment Plug; The Computer-Loaded Plug, The Pyrotechnic Product Plug, And The Test Equipment Plug Are Based On Their Original Pins. Four Pins Have Been Added; In Addition, The On-Board Resistance Detection Circuit Is Added To The On-Board Computer Connected To The Plug Of The Missile-Borne Computer, And The Test Equipment Resistance Detection Circuit Is Added To The Test Equipment Connected To The Test Equipment Plug; The On-Board Resistance Detection Circuit, The Resistance Detection Circuit Of The Test Equipment Is Matched With The Four Additional Pins Of The Computer Plug, The Pyrotechnics Plug And The Test Equipment Plug To Accurately Detect The Connection Status Of The Two-Way Pyrotechnics Plug; Therefore, The Air-To-Air Missile Is Completely Installed. After The Operation, Neither The Missile Mount Operator Nor The Pilot Of The Aircraft Could Check The Connection Status Of The Missile-Borne Computer Plug And The Pyrotechnic Device Plug, So That The Risk Of The Missile-Borne Computer Plug And The Pyrotechnic Product Plug Leaking Connection Was Completely Eliminated.

title: Special Area Intrusion Uav Early Warning Interception Control System
abstract: A Special Area Intrusion Drone Early Warning And Interception Control System, Including A Detection And Disposal System And A Control Command System. The Detection And Disposal System Includes: An Electronic Signal Command Detection And Acquisition Module, A Radar Detection Module, An Optical Matrix Remote Detection System, And A Takeover Control Module , Uav Remote Control Signal Data Link Blocking Interference Module, Netting Transmission Module, Signal Data Orientation Module And Navigation Interference Signal Transmission Module; The Control Command System Includes Server, Approval Control Unit, Uav Database Module, Uav Data The Comparison Module And The Navigation Data Module; The Communication Connection Is Established Between The Two Systems And Between The Parts Of Each System Respectively Through Wired Or Wireless Means. The Advantages Of The Present Invention Are: By Arranging A Plurality Of Detection And Disposal Systems In A Circle, The Foreign Drones Are Detected, Monitored And Identified In The Identification Area, And Illegally Invaded Drones Are Dealt With Before Entering The Core Protection Area To Ensure The Security Of The Core Protected Area.

title: A Mobile Multi-Point Arrangement Blasting Remote Control Vehicle Used In Dangerous Environment
abstract: The Invention Provides A Mobile Multi-Point Arrangement Blasting Remote Control Vehicle For Dangerous Environments, Which Is Composed Of A Supporting Frame, A Radio Communication Module, A Vertical Roller Mechanism, An Explosive Carrier, A Rotating Baffle Mechanism, And A Carrier Replacement Mechanism (Two Sets Of Symmetrical Arrangement), The Carrier Output Mechanism, Power Mechanism And Other Auxiliary Parts Are Composed. title: Vehicle-Mounted Anti-Uav Monitoring And Intercepting Device
abstract: A Vehicle-Mounted Anti-Uav Monitoring And Intercepting Device Belongs To The Technical Field Of Uav Security Defense, And Particularly Relates To An Anti-Uav Monitoring And Intercepting Device, Including Off-Road Vehicles, Radar Early Warning Systems, Intelligent Monitoring Systems, And Storage Systems. Energy Box, High And Low Angle Adjuster And Electronic Interference System. When The Drone Enters The Protected Area, The Radar Early Warning System Scans The Drone And Transmits The Signal To The On-Board Control Center. The On-Board Control Center Controls The Electronic Jamming System To Transmit Interference Signals In The Frequency Band Where The Drone Is Located To Interfere With Its Uplink And Downlink. The Frequency Band Signal Transmission Makes The Remote Control Fail, And The Captured Images And Videos Cannot Be Transmitted Back, Forcing The Drone To Hover And Land In The Air, Completely Cutting Off The Connection Between The Drone And The Remote Control Or Ground Station. The Invention Can Realize The Interception Of Various Types Of Uavs And Track Low- And Medium-Speed Uavs, And Adopts A Vehicle-Mounted Uav That Can Flexibly Inhibit Illegal Intrusion.

title: Management System Of Several Snipers
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Guidance And Control System And Can Be Used For Anti-Terrorist Operations To Release The Hostages Or Neutralize Self-Explosion Acts Performed By Suicide Bombers Or For Military Sniper Operations. The Technical Effect: Synchronous Targets Firing From Different Firing Positions, Increasing An Accuracy Of Target Firing, Guidance Correction Of Precision Weapon. Each Individual Kit Consists Of A Radio Facility For Verbal Radio Communication And A Sniper Rifle With Optical Sight. A Laser Target Designator And A Laser Rangefinder With Photosensor, A Sniper Standby Sensor, A Small-Sized Video Camera With Guided Zoom-Lens, A Firing Pin Remote Activation Device, A Wman Radiomodem, A Satellite Navigational Receiver And Other Equipment, A Bipod Are Installed On The Rifle, Additionally. title: A Fixed Anti-Uav Interception Net System
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Fixed Anti-Uav Interception Net System Including An Interception Net Body, A Traction Net Body Rocket Device, A Collision Air Foaming Impact Device And An Electromagnetic Guide Device. It Is Characterized In That The Interception Net Body Adopts A Mesh-Like Object Woven By High-Strength, High-Modulus Polyethylene Fiber And Intelligent Communication Conductive Fiber, And An Information, Intelligent, And Perceptual Device Installed On The Interception Net Body, Which Realizes The Realization Of Small, Low-Altitude, Slow The Early Warning Interception Function Of High-Speed, Spiral-Wing Uav. When The Drone Strikes, The Traction Mesh Rocket Device Carries The Interception Mesh Body And Rises To The Highest Point. The Mesh Body Is Suspended In The Air. The Electromagnetic Guidance Device Is Used To Gather The Mesh Body To Form A Net Bag To Achieve Accurate And Efficient Interception And Capture. Man-Machine Function. The Invention Has The Characteristics Of Intelligent Interception, Stable Performance, Accurate Positioning, High Sensitivity, Simple Operation, Etc., And Can Be Used For Intercepting Small, Low-Altitude, Slow-Speed, Spiral-Wing Drones In The Air.

title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Ground-Air Defense Device System
abstract: The Present Invention Relates To An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Ground-Air Defense Device System, Which Mainly Includes A Radar Defense Early Warning Network, A Central Computer Defense System And Multiple Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Bases; The Radar Defense Early Warning Network Has An Air Radar And A Signal Transmitting Module; The Central Computer Defense System Is Wirelessly Connected To The Radar Defense Early Warning Network And Has A Central Computer, A Signal Receiving Module, A Processor, A Database And An Information Display Module; Multiple Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Bases Are Wirelessly Connected To The Central Computer Defense System, Each The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Base Is Equipped With Multiple Unmanned Aerial Vehicles And A Wireless Charging Module, And Each Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Is Equipped With A Mobile Device And A Net Spreader; Thereby, The Present Invention Can Be Used When Foreign Missiles Or Fighters Have Not Reached The Target To Be Attacked. title: A Photoelectric Early Warning Tracking Strike System
abstract: The Invention Discloses A Photoelectric Early Warning Tracking Strike System, Which Belongs To The Technical Field Of Uav Safety Systems. title: Bullet-Cavitator For Underwater Firearm
abstract:

title: Firing Method Of Guided Missile With Laser Half-Active Homing Head And Device Realizing Thereof
abstract:

abstract: Embodiments Of A Non-Lethal Delivery Canister, A Bomber/Perpetrator Threat-Mitigation System, And Methods Of Mitigating Bomber And Perpetrator Threats Are Generally Described Herein. title: A Mineral Powder Bomb
abstract: A Mineral Powder Bomb Whose Powder Material Is Composed Of Aluminum Oxide, Silicon Dioxide, And Silicon Carbide. After Being Exploded And Dispersed In The Air, It Can Affect Jet Fighter Engines, Windshield Glass, And Stealth Wave-Absorbing Coatings And Airspeeds Of Aircraft. title: A Search Method For Optimal Launch Time Of Active Defense Missile Using Predictive Guidance
abstract: The Invention Relates To The Technical Field Of Aircraft Guidance And Control, And Discloses An Optimal Launch Timing Search Method For An Active Defense Missile Using Predictive Guidance. The Method Includes: An Active Defense Three-Body Confrontation Kinematics Model, And The Flight Status Of The Carrier Aircraft And The Incoming Missile Solve The Flight Trajectory Of The Incoming Missile Under The Known Guidance Law, Calculate The Predicted Intercept Point Sequence At Different Launch Times Of The Defense Missile, Calculate The Predicted Course Deviation Angle Sequence Formed By The Defense Missile And The Predicted Intercept Point, And Search For The Optimal Launch Of The Defense Missile Opportunity. This Method Searches For The Optimal Launch Timing Of The Defense Missile In The Active Defense Problem, And Provides The Carrier With The Ability To Intelligently Launch. title: Method Of Automatic Group Target Allocation Of Fighters Based On Priority Of Targets
abstract:
Field: Aviation.
    Substance: Invention Relates To Aircraft Control Systems And Can Be Used In A Complex Of Functional Programs For Control And Guidance Of Aircraft Systems For Assigning Targets To Interceptors When Aircraft Groups Are Confronted. Disclosed Method Enables To Determine Purpose Of Targets For Interceptors In A Group Confrontation. Method Is Based On Using An Interception Efficiency Functional. Functional Is Determined For Each Pair Of "Interceptor-Target" And Takes Into Account Both Time And Energy Costs For Interception. Then Among A Certain Class Of Trajectories One Is Selected, Which Ensures Minimum Of Specified Functional At Fulfillment Of Restrictions On Maximum Speed And Acceleration Of Interceptor. Intercept Matrix Is Composed Of Obtained Minimum Values Of Functionals. For Important Purposes, Probability Of Interception Of A Target By One Interceptor Is Determined And Required Probability Of Their Interception Is Set. Required Number Of Interceptors For Each Of The Important Targets Is Determined Based On The Required Probability Of Their Destruction. Then, Such Distribution Of Targets By Interceptors Is Sought, Which Minimizes Total Quality Functional And Which Provides Required Probability Of Interception Of Important Targets. Depending On The Number Of Interceptors, The Minimization Problem Is Formulated Either As An Assignment Problem With An Interception Matrix Or With Some Other Matrix Obtained From An Interception Matrix, Or In The Form Of A Problem Of Searching For A Minimum Value Flow In A Graph. Solving This Task Determines Assignment Of Targets To Interceptors Together With Corresponding Trajectories Of Interception.
    Effect: Technical Result Is Providing Automatic Optimum Assignment Of Targets To Interceptors Based On Priority Of Targets.
    1 Cl, 3 Dwg

abstract:

A Sighting System (250); E. Means (240) For Firing Said Munition; F. A Fire Control Emitter And A Fire Control Receiver (340) And Means For Connection Between Said Emitter And Said Receiver.

title: Fragmentation Munition With Limited Explosive Force
abstract: A Fragmentation Munition (10) Has A Fragmentation Canister (22) Containing Preformed Fragments (66), And An Explosive Cartridge (24) That Fits Into A Central Hole (80) In The Fragmentation Canister. The Explosive Cartridge Includes An Outer Shell (110), And An Explosive (114) Within The Outer Shell. The Munition May Be Configured To Precisely Deliver Fragments To A Relatively Small Area, Such As An Area That Is A Few Meters In Radius. Toward That End The Explosive May Be Configured Primarily To Rupture The Housing And Secondarily To Spread Fragments Over A Limited Area. The Main Kinetic Energy Of The Fragments Is From The Acceleration They Gain As Part Of The Munition Falls From A Launcher, Such As A Carrier Aircraft. The Dispersed Fragments May Have A Similar Downward Velocity After Controlled Dispersal By The Explosive, Allowing Them Considerable Kinetic Energy (Considerable Penetrating Power), But With A Precisely Controlled Dispersal Area.

title: Method For Stacking A Vehicle On Top Of Another, Similar Vehicle, And Stackable Vehicle For Carrying Out Said Method
abstract: The Invention Refers To A Method For Stacking A First Motor Vehicle On Top Of A Second Motor Vehicle, Comprising The Steps Of : Providing A Set Of Rear Ramps At The Rear Part Of The Lower Vehicle, Said Rear Ramps Linking The Rear Part Of The Roof Of The Cabin Of The Lower Vehicle, To The Ground; Providing A Set Of Front Ramps Or Supports In The Front Part Of The Roof Of The Cabin Of The Lower Vehicle, Said Set Of Front Ramps Or Supports Being Such That The Front Wheels Of The Upper Vehicle, Can Roll Over The Same; Rolling The Upper Vehicle On Said Rear Ramps Of The Lower Vehicle So That The Upper Vehicle Ascends Or Climbs From A Position On The Ground To A Position On Top Of The Roof Of The Lower Vehicle; Continue Rolling Said Upper Vehicle Over The Roof Of The Lower Vehicle Until It Reaches A Final Stack Position, Indicated By A Stopping Means, In Which The Front Wheels Of The Upper Vehicle Rest Upon The Front Ramps Or Supports Of The Lower Vehicle, The Rear Wheels Of The Upper Vehicle Rest Upon The Rear Ramps Of The Lower Vehicle, Where The Upper Vehicle And Lower Vehicle Are Substantially Vertically Aligned, And Where The Front Wheels And Rear Wheels Of The Upper Vehicle In Final Rest Position Are In A Lower Height Than The Height Of The Roof Of The Lower Vehicle; Securing The Upper Vehicle To The Lower Vehicle By Suitable Fastening Means, Where The Fastening Force Of The Fastening Means Preferably Is Such That The Suspensions Of The Upper Vehicle Are Compressed By About 3 To 5 Cm, Thus Reducing The Overall Height Of The Vehicle Stack; And, Removing, Folding Or Retracting Part Of Or The Entirety Of The Rear Ramps Of The Lower Vehicle. Additionally, The Invention Refers To A Vehicle That Can Carry Out Said Stacking Method, Which Comprises A Vehicle Body Comprising Four Wheels And A Roofed Cabin, A Pair Of Front Ramps Or Supports Located At Both Sides Of The Front End Of The Roof Of The Cabin And A Pair Of Rear Ramps Located At Both Sides Of The Rear End Of The Roof Of The Cabin. The Stackable Vehicle Further Comprises Means For Rapid Aerial Deployment (Airdrop) Of Vehicles Transported In A Stack In A Transport Aircraft.

title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle For Aerial Reconnaissance, And Unmanned Defense System And Method Using Same
abstract: Disclosed Are An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle For Aerial Reconnaissance, Which Performs Object Detection And Object Hitting On The Basis Of Image Information, And An Unmanned Defense System And Method Using The Same. The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle For Aerial Reconnaissance Comprises: An Image Information Collection Unit For Collecting Image Information For A Predetermined Area; And A Control Unit For Detecting An Object Existing In The Predetermined Area On The Basis Of The Collected Image Information. Accordingly, The Present Invention Can Continuously Perform Reconnaissance And Surveillance Using The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle, So As To Collect And Deliver Accurate Information On The Status Of Movements Of Friendly Troops And Enemy Troops, Detect An Object Estimated As The Enemy Troops And Distinguish Between Friend And Foe, And Hit The Object Estimated As The Enemy Troops. Therefore, It Is Possible To Perform Various Military Operations When A War Breaks Out And Thereby Significantly Reduce The Damage Of The Friendly Troops.

title: A Missile Warfare System Based On Individual Combat Vehicles
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Weapon System, In Particular To A Weapon System That Uses A Special Individual Combat Vehicle Carrying Multiple Missiles To Carry Out Long-Distance Missile Strangling Dozens Of Kilometers Away. It Mainly Includes Individual Combat Vehicles, Carrier Vehicles, Command Vehicles, Missile Ammunition Supplement Vehicles, Battery And Rechargeable Generator Sets, Miniature Remote Reconnaissance Aircraft, Remote Control Helicopters And Their Remote Control Devices. Eventually, The Land Warfare Will Be Upgraded To Modern Iii Missile Warfare.

title: Vehicle-Mounted Anti-Uav Net Bomb Interception System
abstract: A Vehicle-Mounted Anti-Uav Net Bomb Interception System Includes A Search Pan/Tilt, An Early Warning Detector And A Launch Tube Set On The Search Pan/Tilt, And Sub-Munitions Set In The Launch Tube. The Present Invention Solves The Technical Problem That The Interception Method Proposed In The Prior Art Is Only Applicable To The Propeller-Type Uav Of Metal Materials, Is Difficult To Apply To The High-Speed And Maneuverable Uav Targets, And Is Easy To Cause Secondary Damage To Ground Personnel Or Other Targets . The Invention Obtains The Distance And Speed Information Of The Uav Through A Millimeter-Wave One-Shot And Double-Receiving Early Warning Frequency Modulation Radar, And Searches, Tracks, And Automatically Aims At The Uav By Searching The Cloud Platform, And Launches The Net Bomb; The Net Bomb Is Equipped With A Proximity Fuse To Missing Distance Is The Base Point For Timely Ignition, Launching Small Rockets, So That The Net Bomb Can Obtain The Best Net Opening Speed And Flight Speed Coordination, Minimize The Time To Approach The Target, And Improve The Interception And Capture Efficiency Of The Net Bomb Interception System. It Is Suitable For High Speed , Mobile Drones For Precise Interception And Capture.
applicant: Wuhu Bogao Optoelectronics Technology Co., Ltd.

title: A Combat Reconnaissance Robot
abstract: The Invention Provides A Combat Reconnaissance Robot, Which Includes An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle, A Towing Rope, A Towing Net, And A Combat Robot. The Characteristic Is That The Towing Net Is Woven From Flexible Fiber Ropes, And A Towing Rope Is Arranged Around The Towing Net. , The Upper End Of Each Towing Rope Is Connected To The Bottom Of The Frame Of A Drone, And A Combat Robot Is Placed On The Towing Net; The Combat Robot Can Be Carried In The Air By Setting Up The Drone And The Towing Net, And The Combat Robot Can Use The Anesthesia Gun To Attack The Enemy. The Soldiers On The Side Are Anesthetized And Will Not Harm The Other¡¯S Life, And The Combat Robot Can Also Bring The Enemy Soldiers Back To The Drag Net.

title: Method And System For Portable Wireless Fire Control Equipment To Realize Rapid Equipment Control Of Space-Based Weapons
abstract: The Invention Discloses A Method And A System For Realizing Rapid Equipment Control Of An Air-Based Weapon By A Portable Wireless Fire Control Device. The Method Relates To A Portable Wireless Fire Control Device And An Air-Based Weapon. Among Them, Portable Wireless Fire Control Equipment Includes Wireless Communication Modules, Display Screens, Buttons, Etc. In The Method, The Weapon And The Carrier Transmit Information Through The Wireless Communication Module. The Information Includes The Weapon Status And Related Instructions. The Display Screen Can Display The Weapon Status, Fire Control Information, Etc., And The Pilot Sends Instructions To The Weapon Through The Button Control. Activate A Series Of Operations Such As Thermal Battery And Fuze Control. The Invention Can Adapt The Weapon To Mount Different Carrier Aircraft Without Any Modification Of The Carrier Aircraft, Greatly Improve The Compatibility Of The Weapon And The Carrier Aircraft, Without Modification Cost, And Strong Operability. The Invention Has Low Requirements On The Type Of The Carrier Aircraft, Simple Operation, Can Quickly Realize The Equipment Use Of The Weapon, Improves The Adaptability Of The Weapon To The Carrier Aircraft, And Broadens The Market Application Of The Weapon.
applicant: Beijing Aerospace Feiteng Equipment Technology Co., Ltd.

title: Airborne Fire Support Device For Tactical Airlifter In Aircraft, Has Nacelle Including Gun And Turret Movable In Azimuth And Elevation, And Fire Control System Providing Complete Autonomous Aerial Cover To Deployed Troops In Combat Zone
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Device Making It Possible To Gather, In Only One Nacelle, A Turret Equipped With A Clearance In Azimuth And Site; Equipped With A Gun With Average Gauge, Or Grenade Thrower, Heavy Machine Guns, Or Of A Mixing Of These Means; As Well As The Ammunition Supply Of This Armament; And Finally Fire Control System Comprising The Device Of Pointing Optronic, A Laser Rangefinder And A Navigation System Assisted By Satellites. This Nacelle Is Equipped With Hooks Which Make It Possible To Fix It With The Pylons Of Carrying Of External Loads Of A Tactical Transport Aircraft, To The Manner Of The Auxiliary Tanks Of Fuel Usually Assembled On This Type Of Aircraft. It Makes It Possible To Adapt, Simply And Without Structural Modification, A Tactical Transport Aircraft To The Missions Of Fire Support Of The Troops On The Ground, And To Thus Offer A Consequent Aerial Cover To The Operations Of Too Low Intensity To Justify The Deployment Of Fighters. This Device Can Be Easily Posed And Deposited Pylon Of Carrying Of External Loads Of The Aircraft By Means Of Adequate Fixings. Implementation Of The Gun And The System The Optronic Of Designation Of Objective Is Done Since The Cockpit Of The Plane, By The Means Of The Electrical Circuits Of The Already Existing Aircraft. The Device According To The Invention Is Particularly Intended For The Airborne Fire Support Of Troops Deployed In Zones Of Combat.

title: Multimode Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
abstract:
Problem To Be Solved: To Provide An Attack System By An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (Uav) To A Ground Target.
    Solution: A Uav 410 May Be In A Racetrack Of A Circle (I.E. Rotation About A Ground Point Or A Positional Target) Or Other Flight Pattern 420 As A Part Of A Target Search Mode, Reconnaissance Mode, Surveillance Mode, Investigation Mode And/Or Other Observation Mode. Seeker Processing, Together With Guidance Processing And/Or An Uplink From A Command Node, E.G. A Ground Command Node 450, May Place The Uav 410 Into A Terminal Homing Strike Mode 430. The Uav 410 Then May Home On A Ground Target 440, E.G., A Ground Vehicle, In An Effort To Get Close Enough To Effectively Deploy A Payload, Such As Detonating A Warhead, Dropping A Beacon, Or Dispensing A Pigment, And/Or Effect A Collision With A Target.

title: Reconnaissance Position Calculating Device, Reconnaissance Position Calculation Method And Reconnaissance Position Calculation Program
abstract: An Aircraft (10) Includes A Memory (15),  And A Controller (18). The Memory (15) Stores Map Data (155) Including At Least A Predetermined Surveillance Target Region (Ra). The Controller (18) Divides The Map Data (155) Stored In The Memory (15) Into A Plurality Of Cells (C) In A Grid On A Horizontal Plane. The Controller (18) Determines An Los Score P For Each Of Candidate Cells (Ca) Among The Cells (C) Excluding Surveillance Target Cells (Rc) Included At Least In The Surveillance Target Region (Ra). The Los Score P Is Obtained By Quantitatively Evaluating Easiness Of Viewing From Aircraft (10) And Difficulty Of Being Viewed From A Surveillance Target. The Controller (18) Sets Surveillance Positions (Sp) On A Basis Of The Los Score P Of Each Candidate Cell (Ca).

title: Ammunition Supply Trailer For Fighter
abstract: The Present Invention Relates To A Fighter Plane Ammunition Supply Trailer Capable Of Preventing A Safety Accident Of A Worker As A Live Ammunition Supply Head Is Quickly And Stably Combined With A Fighter Plane Through A Lifting Means Equipped In An Ammunition Supply Trailer When The Fighter Plane Is Loaded With Live Ammunition. Moreover,  The Fighter Plane Ammunition Supply Trailer Comprises :  A Cylindrical Live Ammunition Storage Drum Wherein Live Ammunition Is Stored;  A Flexible Duct With A Predetermined Length Equipped To Circulate A Carrying Chain Carrying Live Ammunition;  An Ammunition Supply Head To Collect An Empty Cartridge Case,  And To Be Loaded With Live Ammunition At The Same Time;  A Live Ammunition Supply Device And A Cartridge Case Collect Device To Supply Live Ammunition Stored In The Live Ammunition Storage Drum,  And To Store A Collected Cartridge Case In The Live Ammunition Storage Drum;  A Boom Formed To Be Stepped So As To Be Variable In A Longitudinal Direction;  And A Lifting Means To Lift The Live Ammunition Supply Head.Copyright Kipo 2015

title: High Mobility-Space Threat Target Processing System Of Next Generation Naval Compat System
abstract: Disclosed Is A High-Mobility Space Threat Target Processing System Of A Battle System For A Next-Generation Naval Vessel. The High-Mobility Space Threat Target Processing System Of A Battle System For A Next-Generation Naval Vessel Comprises: A Multi-Function Radar (Mfr) Sensor To Generate Detection Information; And A High-Mobility Space Threat Target Alarm Module To Output An Alarm For A Threat Target In The Detection Information Generated By The Mfr Sensor. The High-Mobility Space Threat Target Alarm Module Is Configured To Output An Alarm For A Threat Target Received From A Friendly Naval Vessel Through A Data Link. The High-Mobility Space Threat Target Processing System Of A Battle System For A Next-Generation Naval Vessel Analyzes The High Mobility And Altitude Of A Raw Target First For A High-Mobility Space Threat Target Such As A Ballistic Missile Without Using A General Tactic Target Calculation Algorithm To Pre-Classify The High-Mobility Space Threat Target To Quickly Recognize And Respond To The Ballistic Missile.

title: System Of Ship To Air Missile At Salvo Mode For Next Generation Naval Ship
abstract: Disclosed Is A Ship-To-Air Missile Salvo System For A Next-Generation Naval Ship. The Ship-To-Air Missile Salvo System For A Next-Generation Naval Ship Comprises: A Salvo Control Device To Control A Salvo; And A Ship-To-Air Missile For A Salvo Salvoed In Accordance With Control Of The Salvo Control Device. According To The Ship-To-Air Missile Salvo System For A Next-Generation Naval Ship, If A Ship-To-Air Missile (A) For A Salvo Fired First Hits A First Target, A Continuously Fired Ship-To-Air Missile (B) For A Salvo Is Controlled In Real Time To Set A Second Target To Improve Fighting Strength And Lower The Mortality Rate Of Ship-To-Air Missiles In A Salvo Mode. Moreover, If The Ship-To-Air Missile (A) For A Salvo Fired First Does Not Hit The First Target, The Corresponding Ship-To-Air Missile (A) For A Salvo Fired First Is Also Controlled In Real Time To Set The Second Target To Increase Battle Efficiency In The Salvo Mode. Meanwhile, If The Second Target Is Set, An Overall Sensor System Detection Target Of A Sensor System Detection Target Management System Of A Naval Ship Or A Battle List And Threat Rank Lists Are Referred To Automatically Set The Second Target Of An Enemy With A High Priority To Increase Battle Concentration By Resolving An Emergency Situation.

title: Fighter Device For Destruction Of Drones
abstract: Field :  Aircraft Engineering.Substance :  Fighter For Destruction Of Drones Comprises A Drone And Surface Guidance System Composed Of Radar. Drone Is Equipped With Video Cameras Of Surveillance,  Up To Four Displacement Transducers And Up To Four Containers Coupled Therewith And Furnished With Hitting Elements Composed Of Cassettes With Cases Filled Needles Provided With Band-Type Parachutes. Said Cases Are Shot From Cassette Along With The Case Incorporating Inertial Fuse To Separate Case To Needle And To Release Band Parachute And Displacement Transducers. title: Method Of Safe Landing Of Armoured Vehicles In Combat Zone
abstract: Field :  Aircraft Engineering.Substance :  Proposed Method Consists In That Drone Is Launched From Landing Ship Before Unshipping Armoured Vehicles And Controlled From Remote Control Station Arranged At Ship Deck. Optical Ir Reconnaissance Hardware Of The Drone And Onboard Radar With Synthesized Aperture Are Used To Locate Enemy Aircraft,  Ships And Submarines And To Transmit Defined Coordinated Via Radio Lines To Remote Control Station And,  Therefrom,  To Friendly Armoured Vehicles And High-Speed Boats To Destroy Enemy Airborne And Water Equipment. Results Of Fire Delivered To The Enemy Are Controlled By Said Drone And Transmitted To Landing Ship Remote Control Station.Effect :  Efficient Combat Actions,  Survivorship Of Landing Ship.1 Dwg

title: Method For Protection From Terrorists At Water Areas
abstract:
Field :  Radio Engineering,  Communication.
    Substance :  Method Involves Using A Non-Lethal Agent Based On A Cs Irritant. A Ship Is Fitted With A System With Both Reconnaissance And Striking Unmanned Aerial Vehicles. The Method Includes,  Upon Detecting A Hazardous Object,  Carrying Out A Warning Fly-By With A Reconnaissance Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Over An Object Classified By The System Operator In Collaboration With Ship Drivers As Safe At The Moment Of Detection,  Carrying Out A Warning Fly-By With The Striking Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Over An Object Classified As Potentially Hazardous,  With Deployment Of An Aerosol Cloud,  Striking,  With The Striking Unmanned Aerial Vehicle,  A Moving Object Classified As Hazardous,  With Deployment Of A Screening Cloud In Front Of The Object,  Which Prevents Hijacking Of The Ship By Suspicious Persons Through Preventive Neutralisation Thereof. The Unmanned Aerial Vehicles Used Can Be A Quadcopter Controlled From An On-Board Mobile Portable Computer Connected To The Glonass System Or Separately From The Glonass System.
    Effect :  High Efficiency Of Fighting Terrorism.
    2 Cl,  2 Dwg

title: Method Of Target Capture By Laser Homing Head Of Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
abstract: Field :  Aviation,  Weapon And Ammunition.Substance :  Proposed Technical Solution Relates To Drones With Laser Homing Heads And Can Be Used In Rockets,  Arranged At Outer Suspensions Carrier Aircraft. Target Capture By Laser Homing Head Of Drone Is As Follows :  Target Is Illuminated By Light Pulse From The Illumination Station Arranged On Aircraft Carrier,  Using Photodetector Placed In Laser Self-Guidance Head Of Drone Fix Glow Of The Atmosphere And Convert Into Electric Current. Device For Generating Strobing Pulses Generate Strobe Pulse Opening Amplifier Of The Laser Self-Guidance Head Of Drone For The Time Of Expecting Arrival Of Signal Reflected From A Target.Effect :  Use Of Different Carrier Aircraft With Different Types Of Drone Without Additional Modification Of The Carrier Target Illumination Station.1 Cl,  5 Dwg

title: Combat Robot Mobile System
abstract:
Field :  Robotics.
    Substance :  Invention Relates To Robotic Systems For Remote Operation Under Combat Conditions. Combat Robot Mobile System Comprises A Light-Weight Armoured Car With Engine,  Transmission,  Running Gear With Propulsor,  Weapons And Equipment Control. Armour Is Multilayer And Consists Of A Solid Rubber,  Plastic And A Layer Of Viscoelastic Armoured Plate. System Is Controlled From A Panel Via A Radio Channel With Transmission Of Video And Audio Accompaniment. Mobile System Consists Of Case Accommodating Running Gear With Three Pairs Of Wheels. Rotation Of Wheels Is Carried Out By Motor Via Reduction Gear And Steering Rack. Two Rear Wheels Are Connected By Chain Gear And Driven By An Electric Motor With Radio Control Via Receiver And Transmitter Connected To Radio Antenna. Supply Of Electric Motors And Control Units Is Carried Out By Onboard Power Supply. At Bottom In Front Part Of Body There Is A Unit With An Explosive And Controlled By Radio Fuse.
    Effect :  Higher Safety Due To Remote Control System.
    1 Cl,  3 Dwg

title: Robotic Target Of Anatomic Shape
abstract:
Field :  Weapons And Ammunition.
    Substance :  Device Is Intended For Combat,  Sports,  Training Weapons Shooting Practice. Target Of Anatomic Shape Consists Of The Target Figure,  A Lifting Mechanism,  A Control System Unit,  A Control Channel,  A Control Panel;  It Is Characterised By That For Simulation Of A Soldier Moving In A Battlefield The Target Lifting Mechanism Comprises A Housing,  A Motor,  A System Of Electric End Switches,  A Reduction Gear,  A Crank-And-Rod Mechanism Interacting With The Second Driven Rod,  Wherein To Both Rods One Or More Ground Joists Are Connected,  On Which The Target Frame Is Mounted;  Herewith The Target From The Side Of The Trainee Shooter Is Raised With Actual Speed Of An Attacking Soldier Rising And The Target Frame Can Be Flat Or Semi-Volume Or Volume Type,  As Well As It Can Be Made Corresponding To The Size And The Shape Of An Average Person,  And The Whole Surface Of The Target Is The Hitting Zone Divided Into Multiple Segments,  On Which There Are Sensors In The Form Of Coatings,  Which Surface Is Made Of Current-Conducting Materials,  Which Been Penetrated With A Bullet Can Close Current-Conducting Layers And Create A Signal Of The Target Segment Killing;  Herewith Each Segment Has A Damage Level Mark For The Bullet Penetration Defined By The Controller And Indicating :  Unconditional Wound Of The Target Unprotected Parts Depicting The Fighter Body,  With Determination Of Severity Of The Injury,  And In Zones Most Vulnerable In A Human Body And Covered With Individual Means Of Armor Protection The Injury Severity Signal Is Generated Considering The Following Factors :  Range,  Class Of Protection And Efficiency Of Small Arms;  Herewith The Robotic Target Of Anatomic Shape Includes :  Firing Means Simulator As An Optical System Of Light-Emitting Diodes Imitating Different Rate Of Fire,  Wire Control Channel Or A Radio Channel With Receiving-Transmitting Communication Devices Between The Base Radio Station Of The Control Panel And The Subscriber Radio Station Made On The Target Lifting Mechanism Housing And On The Control Unit Providing Direct Transfer Of Commands To The Robotic Target Of Anatomic Shape And Providing Feedback For Transmission Of Information Upon The Target Hitting Zones,  Wherein The Controller Is Configured To Determine The Degree Of Damage And The Level Of The Target Protection,  And If There Is A "Light" Or "Medium" Degree Of "Injury" The Command Is Given To Raise Additional Targets Of Anatomic Shape,  Up To 4 Pieces,  Arranged Next To The Main Robotic Target Of Anatomic Shape And Simulating Actions Of A Wounded Fighter Or Not Injured But Repositioned One,  Herewith The Target Lifting Mechanism Is Attached To The Ground Or To A Mechanical Transport Platform.
    Effect :  Providing Raising The Target And Additional Targets With Actual Speed Of An Attacking Soldier Rising,  As Well As Evaluation Of The Damage Level,  Imitation Of Firing Means.
    1 Cl,  9 Dwg

title: Reconnaissance And Fire Weapon System Of Tank Armament
abstract:
Field :  Weapons And Ammunition.
    Substance :  Invention Refers To The Objects Of Armored Vehicles. Reconnaissance And Fire Weapon System Of The Tank Armament Represents A Tank With The Primary Armament And The Control System Of Its Firepower,  A Launcher With The Control System For Storage And Launching Projectiles. The Supporting And Turning Platform Of The Launcher Contains A Container With Jet Projectiles In The Form Of A Module With Blowout Blast Plates And A Subpackage Block In The Form Of Autoloader-Equipped Combustible Shells. Opening Curtains Are Installed In The Rear Part Of The Turret. Containers For Placing And Launching Of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles Are Included Into The Sighting And Observation System. The Unmanned Aerial Vehicles Are Additionally Equipped With Detection And Aiming Devices For Target Destruction,  Systems Of Attachment And Application Of Armament. The System Of Landing Consisting Of The Guiding Block And The Landing Block Is Provided For Landing Of An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle On The Tank.

title: Device For Firing Small Arms
abstract:
Field :  Weapons And Ammunition;  Protective Devices.
    Substance :  Invention Relates To Aiming Means Intended For Small Arms For Safe Firing From A Closed Position. Device For Conducting Aimed Fire With Small Arms Contains Armored Protection For Barrel Of Weapon (1). Support Is Placed In The Loophole On Barrel Of Weapon (1) In The Area Of Its Muzzle Section In Contact With The Section Of The Trunk And Repeats Its Contours. Video Camera (5) Faces Affected Area And Is Connected By Cable (9) To Monitor (8) Located Outside The Affected Area In The Field Of View Of The Fighter. Weapon (1) Is Placed In Support (2). Video Camera (5) Is Installed In Armor Protection Ball (3) Towards Opponent (12) In Such Way That Its Axis Is Parallel To Gun Barrel (1) Of The Fighter.

title: Highly Protected Tank With The Combat Ground Robots And Uav Control System
abstract:

title: Laser Target Designation Registration System
abstract:
Field :  Aviation.
    Substance :  Invention Relates To The Aviation Equipment,  And Can Be Used During Conducting Flight Tests (Ft) Of Aviation Systems And Aircraft Armament Systems Equipped With Laser Target Designation And Guidance Systems. Laser Target Designation Registration System Includes A Target (1),  Combined With The Laser Emitter Targeting Unit (2),  Coordinate Matrix (3) Consisting Of Photodetectors With Installed On The Target Field Area (4) The Laser Radiation Detection And The Signal Generation Fixed Threshold,  Signals Acquisition And Conversion Into The Serial Code Unit (5);  The Signals Conversion Into The Personal Computer Standard Format Unit (7);  Personal Computer (8);  The Global Navigation Satellite System Receiver (9). Each Photodetector Input Is Optically Coupled To The Laser Emitter. Each Photodetector Output Is Connected To The Signals Acquisition And Conversion Into The Serial Code Unit (5) Inputs,  Which Output Is Connected To The Signals Conversion Into The Personal Computer Standard Format Unit (7) Input. Signals Conversion Unit Output Is Connected To The Personal Computer (8) Input. To The Computer (8) Another Input The Global Navigation Satellite System Receiver (9) Output Is Connected. At That,  Photodetectors With The Laser Radiation Detection And Signal Generation Fixed Threshold Are Made With Digital High-Speed Signals Amplitude Measurement Circuits. Into The Laser Target Designation Registration System,  Diffuse-Reflecting Pads Are Additionally Introduced,  Installed On The Rods At A Specified Distance From The Photodetectors Optical Inputs. Each Diffuse-Reflecting Pad Is Optically Connected To The Each Photodetector Input. title: Suicide Bomber Blast Threat Mitigation System
abstract: A Non-Lethal, Sabot-Deployed Blast Shield Mitigates A Suicide Bomber By Wrapping Around The Bomber And Positioning A Plurality Of Protective Layers Over An Explosive Device To Absorb Emitted Heat, Shock Waves, And Projectiles If The Device Is Detonated. Stand-Offs Such As Inflatable Beams Or Pillows Provide Break-Away Zones Between The Protective Layers, Allowing Some Layers To Expand To A Point Of Failure And Absorb The Maximum Possible Energy. Inner Layers Absorb Shock Waves And Heat. One Or More Outer Layers Resist Projectile Penetration. Protective Layers Can Be Positioned On Opposing Sides Of A Suspect In Case Two Explosive Devices Are Present. Shields Can Deploy With Sufficient Energy To Knock Down A Bomber. In Embodiments, A Plurality Of Shields Can Be Applied Without Interference Therebetween. In Some Embodiments, A Round Shield Includes Bolas Which Spread The Shield In Flight In A Cast-Net Dynamic And Wrap Around The Suspect For Shield Attachment.

title: Power Source Unit Body For Catapulting, And Aircraft Carrier Gas-Steam Catapult And Catapulting Method
abstract: A Power Source Unit Body For Catapulting. The Power Source Unit Body For Catapulting (77) Comprises A High-Pressure Chamber (7), A Flow Splitting Chamber (8) And A Cooling Water Chamber (9). High-Temperature High-Pressure Fuel Gas Generated Through Burning Of Gunpowder (36) Enters The Flow Splitting Chamber, A Part Of The Fuel Gas Enters A Vertical Pipe (29) From A Fuel Gas Inlet, And Another Part Of The Fuel Gas Squeezes A Water Bag (19) In The Cooling Water Chamber, So That Cooling Water In The Water Bag Is Sprayed Into The Vertical Pipe From A Cooling Water Nozzle, And Is Mixed With High-Temperature High-Pressure Fuel Gas To Generate Steam, And The Steam And The Gunpowder Fuel Gas Are Formed Into Mixed Gas. In The Power Unit Body For Catapulting, Gunpowder Is Placed In A Cartridge Case (6), And When It Is Required To Release Energy, High-Pressure Gas May Be Released Through Percussion Of The Power Unit Body, Thereby Implementing Catapulting Of A Shipboard Aircraft. title: A Defensive Weapon For Aviation Aircraft
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Defensive Weapon For Aeronautical Aircraft, In Particular To A Method And A Device For Fighter Jets In Defense. When An Enemy Is Found Pursuing Or Launching A Navigation Weapon, The Aircraft Will Launch A Number Of Net Bombs Into The Pursuit Path. The Net Bombs Will Bounce Off To Form A Net Piece After Launching, And The Net Knot Will Wrap Or Hang Metal Objects Or Explosives. When These Meshes Cover The Pursuit Route, The Enemy Aircraft Or The Navigational Weapons Launched By It Can ¡°Hit¡± The Meshes At High Speed Because They Cannot Evade. The High-Speed Movement Of The Aircraft Can Be Damaged Or Explode Due To These Impacts, Thus Achieving Defense. And The Purpose Of The Attack. The Mesh Is Made Of Existing Materials, The Manufacturing Process Is Easy, The Cost Is Low, And The Weight Is Light.

abstract: The Present Invention Relates To A Method For Calculating A Missile Masking Area,  Comprising The Steps Of :  Loading A Model Of The Fuselage Of A Fighter Aircraft;  Extracting The Position Of An Armed Seeker Applied To The Fuselage And Setting The Same As A Reference Position;  Calculating A Masking Area Which Is A Visual Field Blocking Area By The Fuselage,  At The Reference Position;  Storing Information On The Masking Area. The Level Gauges Are Arranged Opposite To Each Other, The Distance Between The Aiming Axis Of The Level Gauge Of The Body Longitudinal Axis Measuring Instrument And The Respective Vertical Lifting Rods Is Equal, And The Objective Lens Of Each Level Gauge Is Equipped With A Movable Plate That Can Shield Or Open The Objective Lens Of The Level, And The Movable Plate Is Far Away From The Objective Lens Of The Level. There Is A Scale On One Side. The Utility Model Simplifies The Steps In The Process Of Determining The Position Of The Longitudinal Axis Of The Body, Improves The Calibration Efficiency, And Calibrates The Weapon System In The Field Environment.
applicant: Li Pingjin Jiao Jian Jian Chen Yuanchun

title: Anti-Missile Attack Missile
abstract: An Anti-Missile Attack Missile, Consisting Of A Mother Bomb (1), A Bullet (2) And A Miniature Unmanned Reconnaissance Aircraft (3); The Top Of The Warhead Of The Mother Bomb (1) Is Equipped With A Miniature Unmanned Reconnaissance Aircraft (3) ), And The Bullets Of The Mother Bullet (1) Are Uniformly Distributed Along The Circumferential Direction Of The Bullet Trajectory Exits (5); The Upper Part Of The Mother Bullet (1) Is Equipped With The Bullet (2) And The Main Control System (4), And The Lower Part Is Equipped With The Main Propulsion (6), The Tail End Is Equipped With A Main Engine (7); The Top Of The Bullet (2) Has A Warhead (8), Is Equipped With A Secondary Control System (9), And The Middle Is Equipped With A Secondary Propellant (10) , The Rear End Is Equipped With A Secondary Engine (11). The Utility Model First Reconnaissance And Then Attack, Can Conceal The Intention Of Attack, And Can Accurately Obtain The Information Of The Enemy'S Missile Or Target, And Effectively Strike The Enemy'S Missile Or Target. In Particular, It Can Solve The Problem That Existing Anti-Missile Systems Cannot Cope With Saturation Strikes Or Multi-Wave Strikes.

title: A Thermally Concealed Laser Combat Robot With Reconnaissance Function
abstract: The Utility Model Discloses A Thermally Concealed Laser Combat Robot With A Reconnaissance Function, Which Includes A Wheel-Crawler Robot Platform. The Wheel-Crawler Robot Platform Includes A Chassis Cabin And Crawler Walking Mechanisms Arranged On The Left And Right Sides Of The Chassis Cabin. A Turret Mounting Seat Is Installed On The Top Plate Of The Chassis Cabin. The Turret Mounting Seat Is Connected To A Bracket Through A Rotary Joint That Can Rotate Infinitely 360 Degrees In The Horizontal Direction. A Laser Cannon, A Multi-Tube Gun And A Laser Generator Are Installed On The Bracket. The Laser Cannon Is Connected With A Laser Generator, And The Laser Generator Is Connected With A Control Cabinet Arranged On The Chassis Cabin; The Front End Of The Chassis Cabin Is Provided With A Laser Radar. The Utility Model Has Good Ability To Climb And Overcome Obstacles, Has The Ability To Survive In High Temperature, Explosion And Strong Corrosion Environments, Has Excellent Infrared Stealth And Detection Functions, And Uses Laser Cannons To Instantly And Silently Strike Enemy Equipment And Personnel And Short-Term Blindness Function, And At The Same Time Has Better Self-Defense.

title: Portable Wireless Control Navigation Device
abstract: The Utility Model Relates To A Portable Wireless Control Navigation Device, Which Adopts Wireless Radio Frequency Communication Mode To Carry Out Information Interaction With Aviation Guided Bombs In A Preset Frequency Band Through A Wireless Link, And Receives State Information Of Precision Guided Bombs Mounted On A Carrier, According To The Information Displayed On The Display Screen. Aviation-Guided Bomb Status Information And Gps Information, Operating The Wireless Fire Control Device To Send Operation Instructions To Precision-Guided Bombs, And At The Same Time Send The Received Satellite Gps Information To The Precision-Guided Bombs. The Use Of Self-Powered Mode Can Adapt To The Requirement Of Mounting Guided Bombs Without Making A Lot Of Changes To The Carrier. This Portable Device Is Independent Of The Carrier And Has A High Degree Of Integration. The Device Includes A Wireless Communication Module, A Display Screen, A Gps Receiver, A Key Control Module, A Central Processing Unit, A Wireless Module Antenna, Etc. The Equipment Has Good Human-Computer Interaction, Easy To Use, And Universal Strong Performance, Reducing Long-Term Aircraft Fire Control System Transformation, Reducing The Cost Of Transformation, And Improving The Adaptability Of The Aircraft Carrier.
applicant: Beijing Aerospace Feiteng Equipment Technology Co., Ltd

title: Missile Ear Device
abstract: The Utility Model Proposes A Missile Lifting Lug Device. The Device Includes: Lifting Lugs, Cover Plate, Compression Spring, Bayonet, Tension Spring, Blocking Cover, Cabin Body, Wherein: The Cabin Body Is Provided With Installation Holes For Installing Lifting Ears, And The Cover Plate Is Provided With Through Holes. The Lifting Lug Is Installed In The Mounting Hole Of The Lifting Lug, One End Of The Compression Spring Is Connected With The Lifting Lug, And The Other End Is Connected With The Cover Plate. When The Missile Is Not Hooked Up, The Compression Spring And Bayonet Limit The Displacement Of The Lifting Lug Along The Axis Of The Mounting Hole Of The Lifting Lug; When The Missile Is In The On-Hook State, The Gravity Load Of The Missile And The Pre-Tightening Force Of The Stopper Make The Lifting Lug Be Installed Along The Lifting Lug. The Hole Axis Moves Outwards. When The Position Of The Bayonet Hole Is Higher Than The Position Of The Bayonet, The Bayonet Moves Inward Under The Action Of The Tension Spring To Eliminate The Positioning Restriction Of The Bayonet On The Lifting Lug; After The Missile Is Launched, The Lifting Lug Is In The Compression Spring Under The Action Of The Load, The Lifting Lugs Return To The Cabin. The Device Realizes That The Lifting Lugs Of The Missile Are Under The Action Of The Bayonet Limit And The Compression Spring, Which Not Only Ensures The Reliable Connection Between The Missile And The Carrier, But Also Makes The Lifting Lugs Embedded In The Body Of The Missile After The Missile Is Launched, Which Has The Function Of Stealth.

title: Perimeter Protection Device For Countering Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
abstract: The Utility Model Discloses An Anti-Uav Perimeter Protection Device, Which Comprises A Body, A Radar Detector Is Installed On The Top Of The Body, A Receiving Radio Frequency Front End Is Installed In The Body, And The High Magnification Camera Is Autonomously Connected To An Intelligent Target Through An Image Collector. The Recognizer Is Connected, One End Of The Instruction Decision Module Is Connected To The Software Radio Module Through The Pseudo-Instruction Generation Module, The Output End Of The Software Radio Module And The Input End Of The Transmitting Radio Frequency Front End Are Electrically Connected, And The Receiving Radio Frequency Front End One End Is Connected To The Frame Bit Analyzer Through The Data Demodulator. The Utility Model Is Based On Radar Detection Technology And Optical Target Recognition Technology, Combined With High-Power Directional Suppression Jamming Technology And "Decoy" Control Code Injection Into The Target Uav Remote Control Channel Technology To Complete The "Low, Slow, Small" Target Characteristics Unmanned Aerial Vehicles Are Used To Suppress And Drive Away Or Even "Trap" To Counteract, In Order To Achieve The Design Purpose Of Effective Low-Altitude And Prevention Of Sensitive Areas.
applicant: Xi'an Zhanyi Aviation Technology Co., Ltd

title: Aviation Training Bomb With Infrared Target
abstract: This Patent Discloses An Aviation Training Bomb With An Infrared Target, Which Includes A Rotor Firing Pin, A Bomb Body, A Smoke Tube, A Tail Wing, An Infrared Target Source And A Safety Mechanism. The Rotor Firing Pin Is Installed At The Foremost End Of The Aerial Training Bomb And Is Connected To The Body Through A Pin; The Smoke Tube Is Placed Inside The Body; The Tail Is Welded To The Cone Of The Body'S Tail; The Infrared Target Source Is Fixed To The Tail Of The Body Through A Pin; One End Of The Safety Mechanism Is Inserted Into The Rotor Firing Pin, One End Is Inserted Into The Infrared Target Source, And One End Has An Installation Interface Fixedly Connected To The Carrier; The Outer Surface Of The Aerial Training Bomb Is Coated With An Infrared Coating. The Beneficial Effects Of The Patent Are: By Installing An Infrared Target Source, It Can Meet The User'S Actual Combat Training Requirements Throughout The Day, Especially Under Complex Environmental Conditions; It Adopts An All-Steel Design, High Manufacturing Precision, And A Stable Streamline. Pneumatic Shape; Mature Technology, Low Cost, Suitable For Mass Production.
applicant: Shanghai Institute of Technical Physics, Chinese Academy of Sciences

title: A Highly Integrated Anti-Uav System
abstract: A Highly Integrated Anti-Uav System Belongs To The Field Of Anti-Uav Technology. The Utility Model Overcomes The Problem Of The Inconsistency Of The Coordinate System Between The Various Devices And The Occlusion Problem Between The Devices, And Proposes A High Integration Level That Integrates Command And Control, Radar, Photoelectric, Radio Detection, Suppression Interference And Navigation Decoy Equipment. Vehicle/Fixed Anti-Uav Systems, Including Servo Turntables, Radar Equipment, Command And Control System Equipment, Radio Detection Equipment, Photoelectric Equipment, Navigation Decoy Equipment, And Interference Suppression Equipment. The System Has Many Advantages, Such As Complete Functions, Small Size, Simple Operation, And High Reliability.
applicant: China Academy of Aerospace Systems Science and Engineering

title: Control Structure Of Anti-Uav System
abstract: The Utility Model Relates To The Technical Field Of Anti-Uavs, In Particular To An Anti-Uav System Control Structure, Including Photoelectric Tracking Equipment, Radio Frequency Interference Equipment And Navigation Decoy Equipment; It Also Includes A Base, And A Horizontal Rotating Unit And The Vertical Rotation Unit Installed On The Horizontal Rotation Unit; The Photoelectric Tracking Device, The Radio Frequency Interference Device And The Navigation Decoy Device Are Installed In Parallel On The Vertical Rotation Unit With The Same Orientation; The Vertical Rotation Unit Can Drive The Photoelectric Tracking Device, Radio Frequency Interference Device And Navigation The Decoy Device Rotates Along The Vertical Plane At The Same Rotation Angle At The Same Time; The Horizontal Rotation Unit Is Used To Drive The Vertical Rotation Unit To Rotate Along The Horizontal Plane, And Enables The Photoelectric Tracking Device, Radio Frequency Interference Device And Navigation Decoy Device To Simultaneously Rotate Along The Horizontal Plane At The Same Rotation Angle Rotate. The Control Structure Of The Anti-Uav System Of The Utility Model Can Take Into Account The Synchronization And Accuracy Of The Interference Control Signal, Thereby Being Able To Improve The Control Effect Of The Uav.
applicant: Chongqing Huayu Electric Group Co., Ltd

title: Drone Warning To Deceive Base Station
abstract: This Application Relates To An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Early Warning Deception Base Station, Which Includes A Detection Component, A Deception Component, A Power Supply Component And A Control Component. The Electrical Output End Of The Detection Component Is Electrically Connected To The Control Component, The Input End Of The Decoy Component Is Electrically Connected To The Control Component, And The Output End Of The Control Component Is Suitable For An External Control Terminal. The Power Input Ends Of The Detection Component, The Decoy Component And The Control Component Are All Electrically Connected To The Power Supply Component, And The Power Supply Component Is Externally Connected To The Power Supply. By Setting Up A Detection Component In The Uav Decoy Base Station, The Detection Component Sends The Detected Uav Signal To The Control Component Through The Network Cable Through The Switch, And The Control Component Controls The Decoy Component To Transmit The Decoy Signal To The Uav Within The Coverage Area. The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Early Warning Decoy Base Station Of The Disclosed Embodiment Integrates Early Warning And Decoy, Which Greatly Reduces The Decoy Signal Transmission Time And Reduces The Impact On The Positioning System Of Living Equipment.
applicant: Beijing rongdingsheng low altitude safety technology Co., Ltd

title: Explosion-Proof Drone Early Warning Deception Base Station
abstract: The Application Relates To An Explosion-Proof Drone Early Warning Deception Base Station, Which Includes An Explosion-Proof Box, A Counter Component, An Antenna Component, A Connecting Wire And A Stuffing Box. The Lower End Of The Explosion-Proof Box Is Provided With An Outlet Hole, The Connecting Piece Is Installed At The Position Of The Outlet Hole, And The Stuffing Box Is Connected To The Connecting Piece. The Counter Component Is Fixedly Installed Inside The Explosion-Proof Box, And The Connecting Wire Passes Through The Outlet Hole And The Connecting Piece, And Is Electrically Connected To The Antenna Component. In This Way, A Closed Space Is Formed By The Explosion-Proof Box, The Counter Component Is Placed In The Explosion-Proof Box, And The Connecting Wire Is Connected To The Counter Component And Is Led Out Through The Stuffing Box To Connect With The External Antenna Component. The Explosion-Proof Drone Early Warning Decoy Base Station According To The Above-Mentioned Embodiments Of The Present Disclosure Can Meet Explosion-Proof Requirements, Is Suitable For Places With Explosion-Proof Requirements Such As The Petrochemical Industry, And Can Effectively Detect And Counter Drones.
applicant: Beijing rongdingsheng low altitude safety technology Co., Ltd

title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Low-Altitude Early Warning And Defense System
abstract: The Utility Model Discloses A Low-Altitude Early Warning And Defense System For An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle, Which Includes A Reconnaissance Unmanned Aerial Vehicle, A Ground Control Vehicle Equipped With Defensive Strike Equipment, And A Command Center; An Early Warning Radar Is Mounted On The Reconnaissance Unmanned Aerial Vehicle For Monitoring Intrusion Targets Are Detected And Early Warning; The Ground Control Vehicle Is Connected To The Reconnaissance Drone Through A Photoelectric Composite Cable To Realize The Transmission Of Electric Energy And Signals Between The Reconnaissance Drone And The Ground Control Vehicle, And The Command Center Is Connected To The Ground Control Vehicle By Wireless Communication. The Utility Model Adopts A Reconnaissance Drone For Low-Altitude Early Warning And Monitoring, And Uses A Ground Control Vehicle To Control The Power Supply Of The Reconnaissance Drone And Conduct Defensive Strikes Against Intrusion Targets. It Has The Advantages Of Flexible Operation, Long Time In The Air, And Large Monitoring Range.
applicant: Anhui Yunyi Aviation Technology Co., Ltd

title: Transport Device For Small Caliber Ammunition, Has Closing- Or Lockable, Cuboid Steel Container And Another Steel Container Spaced At Distance On All Sides From Inner Walls Of Former Container And Arranged Inside Former Steel Container
abstract: A Transport Device For Small Arms Ammunition,  ( 1 ) Consists Of An Outer,  Lock And/Or Lockable First Box And Close (1) With A Plurality Of Similar,  Smaller,  Inner Steel Tanks (20),  Which Receive The Ammunition To Be Transported (50, 51). In Case Of Fire This Transport Device Complies With The Relevant Conditions For A Transport By Means Of Passenger And Small Quantities Of Ammunition International Transport Aircraft.

title: Suicide Bomber Blast Threat Mitigation System
abstract: A Non-Lethal,  Sabot-Deployed Blast Shield Mitigates A Suicide Bomber By Wrapping Around The Bomber And Positioning A Plurality Of Protective Layers Over An Explosive Device To Absorb Emitted Heat,  Shock Waves,  And Projectiles If The Device Is Detonated. Stand-Offs Such As Inflatable Beams Or Pillows Provide Break-Away Zones Between The Protective Layers,  Allowing Some Layers To Expand To A Point Of Failure And Absorb The Maximum Possible Energy. Inner Layers Absorb Shock Waves And Heat. One Or More Outer Layers Resist Projectile Penetration. Protective Layers Can Be Positioned On Opposing Sides Of A Suspect In Case Two Explosive Devices Are Present. Shields Can Deploy With Sufficient Energy To Knock Down A Bomber. In Embodiments,  A Plurality Of Shields Can Be Applied Without Interference Therebetween. In Some Embodiments,  A Round Shield Includes Bolas Which Spread The Shield In Flight In A Cast-Net Dynamic And Wrap Around The Suspect For Shield Attachment.

title: Fragmentation Munition With Limited Explosive Force
abstract: A Fragmentation Munition Has A Fragmentation Canister Containing Preformed Fragments, And An Explosive Cartridge That Fits Into A Central Hole In The Fragmentation Canister. The Explosive Cartridge Includes An Outer Shell, And An Explosive Within The Outer Shell. The Munition May Be Configured To Precisely Deliver Fragments To A Relatively Small Area, Such As An Area That Is A Few Meters In Radius. Toward That End The Explosive May Be Configured Primarily To Rupture The Housing And Secondarily To Spread Fragments Over A Limited Area. The Main Kinetic Energy Of The Fragments Is From The Acceleration They Gain As Part Of The Munition Falls From A Launcher, Such As A Carrier Aircraft. The Dispersed Fragments May Have A Similar Downward Velocity After Controlled Dispersal By The Explosive, Allowing Them Considerable Kinetic Energy (Considerable Penetrating Power), But With A Precisely Controlled Dispersal Area.

title: Training And Test Missile Unmanned
abstract: The Missile (1) Has A Flight On-Board Computer (14) That Is Provided With A Mission Data Memory (140). A Navigation Computer (13) Generates Control Signals For Actuating Control Surface Actuators Mounted In A Payload Hull. An Image Processing Computer (17) Is Connected To A Seeker Head (16) And The Navigation Computer For Exchanging Mission Data For Controlling Navigation Of The Missile. An Event Storage Device (143) Is Provided For Storing Detected Navigation Events During Training Of Carrier Aircraft With Missile. An Independent Claim Is Included For Method For Checking Mission Plan Data.

title: Decoy System
abstract: An Airborne Passive Decoy System 2 For Use In The Radio Waveband, Comprises A Controllable Aerial Propulsion Unit 8 And One Or More Retroreflectors 5. The One Or More Retroreflectors 5 Are Mounted On, Contained Within Or Otherwise Borne By The Controllable Propulsion Unit 8 (The Retroreflector 5 May Be Attached To The Controllable Aerial Propulsion Unit By A Tether 7). The System 2 Is Configured Such That The One Or More Retroreflectors 5 Can Be Deployed As A Decoy At A Desired Location And/Or Time. The Retroreflectors 5 May Be Corner Reflectors And May Be Collapsible And Comprise A Parachute. The Controllable Aerial Propulsion Unit 8 May Be An Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (Uav) (Such As A Quadcopter Or Drone) Or Aerial-Aquatic Vehicle. The System 2 May Be Held Within A Casing Of A Decoy Round, The Round Being Configured To Eject The System From The Casing At A Predetermined Time And/Or Location After Launch.

title: Improved Method Of High Altitutde Release Of Unguided Air-To-Surface Weapon From Fighter Aircraft
abstract: This Invention Provides An Improved Method For The Computation Of Impact Point By The Weapon Aiming System 100 For The Accurate Release Of Air To Surface Unguided Weapon From Higher Altitudes Taking Into Account The Drift Of Weapon Due To The Effect Of Winds Encountered By The Weapon During Its Travel Through Its Ballistic Trajectory. The Wind Model Is Invented To Cater For The Drift Of The Weapon Taking Into Account The Prevailing Wind And The Drift Acceptance Rate Of The Weapon. This Invention Also Provides The Method To Improve The Cue Display On The Cockpit Display For Performing The Accurate Weapon Aiming At Higher Altitudes.

title: A Method For Duel Handling In A Combat Aircraft
abstract: The Invention Relates To A Method For Decision Support Of A First Combat Aircraft In A Duel Situation With A Second Combat Aircraft. The Method Comprises The Steps Of: A) Determining (3) A First Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Of The First Combat Aircraft (1) And Determining (3) A Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Of The Second Combat Aircraft (2) Wherein The Second Combat Aircraft (2) Is Different To The First Combat Aircraft (1) B) Analyzing (4) The First And The Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Determined In The Previous Step (Step A)) By Fitting The First And The Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters To A Predefined Model And C) Combining (5) The First Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Analyzed In The Previous Step (Step B) ) To Calculate A First Value And Combining (5) The Second Plurality Of Combat Value Parameters Analyzed In The Previous Step (Step B) ) To Calculate A Second Value Wherein The First Value And The Second Value Are Compared To Each Other To Determine The Optimum Success Probability Data Of The First Combat Aircraft (1) And Of The Second Combat Aircraft (2) Adapted For Decision Support In The Duel Situation. In This Way A Reliable And Fast Tool For The Pilot Is Provided While The Tool Is Easy To Handle And Assists The Pilot In Order To Make A Quick And Efficient Decision In Duel Situations.

title: Method For Transfering Target And Attacking Target In Sqaud Fly
abstract: Purpose :  A Method For Transferring And Attaching A Target Within A Flight Formation Is Provided To Improve Fighting Efficiency By Effectively Attaching Enemy' S Target And Sharing Information On The Target.Constitution :  A Method For Transferring And Attaching A Target Within A Flight Formation Comprises Following Steps. A Unmanned Aircraft Senses A Target(S502). The Drone Transfers Target Information Sensed By The Unmanned Aircraft(S505). The Unmanned Aircraft Determines A Lock-On Target By Receiving The Target Information(S506). The Unmanned Aircraft Transfers The Information On The Target To A Control Center(S507). The Control Center Checks Whether Or Not The Target Is An Enemy(S508). The Lock-On Target Transfers An Attack Command To The Unmanned Aircraft If The Lock-On Target Is The Enemy. The Unmanned Aircraft Attacks The Lock-On Target(S512).[Reference Numerals] (Aa) Unmanned Aircraft;  (Bb) Adjacent Unmanned Aircraft;  (Cc) Ground Control Center;  (Dd) No;  (Ee) Yes;  (Ff) End;  (S501) Reconnaissance Flight;  (S502) Target Sensed?;  (S503) Target Transfer Cause?;  (S504) Target Attack;  (S505) Transmitting Target Information;  (S506) Determining A Lock-On Target;  (S507) Transmitting The Lock-On Target;  (S508) Lock-On Target Is An Enemy?;  (S509) Attack Stop Command;  (S510) Stopping Attack;  (S511) Attack Command;  (S512) Shooting Arms Toward The Lock-On Targetcopyright Kipo 2013

abstract: The Present Invention Refers To Fuses Relates To Fuses And Fuelling Machine Charging Method, Particularly Fuses Data Charging For Transmitting Data Of Mass Destruction On Compress-Encoded Data Transmitted From Merged Data A Ratio Of The Charging Efficiency, By Computing The Difference Reference Flight Path, May Mount To Fuses Modified Ballistic By Charging Various Induction Of A Universal Shell And A Separate Shell Induction With Steering Device Can Be Applied To, For Example A Fuse Fuelling Machine Relates To Fuses And Charging Method.
